snippet1.javascript: function foo(a, b) { return a + b; }
snippet1.python: def foo(a, b): return a + b

snippet2.javascript: function foo(a, b) { if (a > b) { return a; } else { return b; } }
snippet2.python: def foo(a, b): if (a > b): return a else: return b

snippet3.javascript: function foo1(x, y) { for (i = 0; i < x; i++) { y = y + "."; } return y; }
snippet3.python: def foo(x, y): for i in range(x): y += "." return y

snippet4.javascript: function foo(a, b) { if (b % 2 == 0 && a % 2 == 0) { return True; } else { return False; } }
snippet4.python: def foo(a, b): return (a % 2 == 0 and b % 2 == 0)

snippet5.javascript: function foo(a) { x = 0; for (i = 1; i <= a; i++) { x += i; } return x; }
snippet5.python: def foo(a): x = 0 for i in range(1, a + 1): x += i return x

snippet6.javascript: function foo(a, b) { bar = 1; if (a < b) { for (x = 1; x <= a; x++) { bar *= x; } } else { for (x = 1; x <= b; x++) { bar *= x; } } return bar; }
snippet6.python: def foo(a, b): bar = 1 if (a < b): for x in range(1, a + 1): bar *= x else: for x in range(1, b + 1): bar *= x return bar
